game.name: Gun Club VR
game.categories: Single-player, Tracked Controller Support, VR Only, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Take to the range with an arsenal of the world’s most powerful weaponry in Gun Club VR. Addictive gameplay and unsurpassed realism combine to make Gun Club VR the ultimate virtual weapon simulator. The only thing missing is the smell of the gunpowder.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Take to the range with an arsenal of the world’s most powerful weaponry in Gun Club VR. Addictive gameplay and unsurpassed realism combine to make Gun Club VR the ultimate virtual weapon simulator. The only thing missing is the smell of the gunpowder.

reviewHighlights.text: Great shooting practice and cheaper than actual ammo. Super fun!
Gun Club VR is a VR-focused firearms simulation that commits fully to authenticity, tactile interaction, and mechanical fidelity rather than tradition...
